mil.emp3.mapengine.interfaces

Interface IMilStdRenderer


  • public interface IMilStdRenderer
    This object provides interface to Mild Std renderer. Ir is constructed in the EMP Core and registered with the Map Instance for its usage.

        Gets the bitmap that represents the MilStd icon symbol.
        Parameters:
        sSymbolCode - The symbol code that identifies the 2525 symbol.
        oModifiers - An array of modifiers to apply to the icon.
        oAttr - An array of attributes to use for the icon.

        IEmpImageInfo.

      • getFarDistanceThreshold

        double getFarDistanceThreshold(IMapInstance mapInstance)
        Gets the far distance threshold for the map. All single point MilStd icons at or beyond the far distances threshold (from the camera) are displayed as dots.
        Parameters:
        mapInstance - The map instance for request.
        Returns:
        The far distance threshold in meters.

      • getMidDistanceThreshold

        double getMidDistanceThreshold(IMapInstance mapInstance)
        Gets the mid distance threshold for the map. All single point MiloStd icons at a distance less than the mid distance threshold are displayed as fully qualified MilStd icons. The labels displayed will depend on the maps MilStd label setting. the distances
        Parameters:
        mapInstance - The map instance for request.
        Returns:
        The mid distance threshold in meters.

      • getBitmapCacheName

        java.lang.String getBitmapCacheName()
        Returns the name of the cache used. In the current implementation if we want to use the RenderCache implemented by NASA WW then MilStdRenderer must use "NoBitmapCache". If we want to use the EMP cache then "BitmapCache" or "AdaptiveBitmapCache" should be used. "BitmapCache" and "AdaptiveBitmapCache" does not work well with NAS WW but is kept in place if we move to or add a new map engine.
        Returns:

      • getSelectedIconScale

        double getSelectedIconScale(IMapInstance mapInstance)
        Returns the selected icon scale factor for the map instance.
        Parameters:
        mapInstance -
        Returns:
